original: Danielsson, Karl Wilhelm, rektor, Ulricehamn, f. 14/3/87 i Örkelljunga, Krist. 1., av Carl D. o. Johanna Jönsson. G. 1. 23 m. Berta Appedgren, d. 45. 2. 47 m. Signe Selander. Barn: Gunnar (fosterson) f. 28. — Stud:-ex. i Lund 14, fil, mag. där 17, efterprövn. 22, provar s. å. Vik. adj. i Trelleborg 18, lär. v. Hässleholms tekn. sk. 18-19, e. o. ämneslär. i Söderköping 19-22 o. 23, ord. ämneslär. där 23, adj. i matem., fysik o. kemi v. Köpings samrealsk. fr. 25, rektor v. Ulricehamns dito sed. 29. Led. av styr. f. Köpings föreläsn :-fören. o. stadsbibi. 27-29, led. av Ulricehamns stadsfullm. sed. 31, av drätselkamm. sed. 34, dess v. ordf. sed. 35, huv:man i Ulricehamns Stads o. Redvägs Härads Sparbank. RVO 44.
translated: Danielsson, Karl Wilhelm, principal, Ulricehamn, born March 14th, 1887 in Örkelljunga, Kristianstad County, to Carl D. and Johanna Jönsson. Married firstly on May 23rd, 19xx to Berta Appedgren who passed away in 1945, and secondly in 1947 to Signe Selander. Children: Gunnar (stepson) born in 1928. He obtained a bachelor's degree in Lund in 1914, followed by a master's degree in 1917 and a teaching certificate in 1922. He was a substitute teacher in Trelleborg in 1918, a teacher at Hässleholms technical school in 1918-1919, an assistant subject teacher in Söderköping in 1919-1922, and a regular subject teacher there in 1923. He was a mathematics, physics, and chemistry teacher at Köpings samrealskola from 1925, and became the principal at Ulricehamns since 1929. He was a member of the board for Köpings lecture association and city library from 1927-1929, a member of Ulricehamns city council since 1931, of the finance committee since 1934, and became its vice chairman in 1935. He was also the head of Ulricehamns city and Redvägs härads savings bank. He was awarded RVO (The Royal Order of Vasa) in 1944.

memberOf.name: Ulricehamns city and Redvägs härads savings bank
